  • 8/9/2014

  • Redmond, WA
  • User Experience Designer II
  • Office Mix UX team is building new experiences that simplify the creation and sharing of online lessons. We are looking for a UX designer versed in interaction, creative design solutions, problem solving, and storytelling. You must be part technologist, marketer, and artist. Work with customers and engineers to distill a vision or idea into a product story. The Startup Business Group has launched a variety of great apps that our customers love. From Fresh Paint, to Power Map for Excel, to 3D Builder, and now, Office Mix - we work closely with Microsoft Research and product engineering teams to turn great ideas into great products. We're looking for someone who's forward-thinking and willing to challenge and provoke new ways to connect with our consumers. This position requires excellent design, communication, and organization skills, and the ability to work across teams. You'll also be expected to quickly broaden your technical understanding as new technologies become available. A deep understanding of our customers and creating great product experiences is a must!
